bill.title: Streamlined Sales and Use Tax Amendments
bill.description: Adopts amendments to Hawaii tax laws to implement the streamlined sales and use tax agreement; with section 32, creating a committee to oversee the department of taxation's implementation and administration of, and compliance with the streamlined sales and use tax agreement, to take effect on approval. Effective 7/1/2050. (SD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to ERB, FIN, referral sheet 2
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by ERB on Tuesday, 02-15-11 8:00AM in House conference room 312.

(H) The committees on ERB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Choy, Awana, Hashem, Tokioka, Tsuji, Marumoto; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Pine; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Brower, Evans, Nishimoto.
(H) Reported from ERB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 450) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and Carroll, Herkes, McKelvey excused (3).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-25-11 12:30PM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Chong, Choy, Coffman, Cullen, Har, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. Lee, Morikawa, Yamashita, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Marumoto; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Ward; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Hashem, Tokioka.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 870) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-08-11.

(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Belatti, Marumoto, Riviere, Takai voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Brower, Fontaine, Hanohano, Nishimoto, Thielen, Ward voting no (6) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 283).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to EDT, WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on EDT added the measure to the public hearing scheduled on 03-23-11 1:15PM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on EDT recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in EDT were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Fukunaga, Wakai, Baker, Solomon; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
(S) Reported from EDT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 978) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-30-11 9:30AM in conference room 211.
(S) The committee on WAM deferred the measure.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-07-11 9:30AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kim, Kouchi, Ryan, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Tokuda, Slom.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1229) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
(S) One Day Notice 04-12-11.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 22; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ryan . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 2 (Senator(s) Galuteria, Hee). Transmitted to House.
